what is complete is not again
a sequence and map to everything possible
words can be magic, do use them fully
how would an animal dig it?
smallest unit possible, keep it quark
do a sudden and irreversible quirk
in your lifetime there are many lifetimes
haven't had / done that in a while
random files, see what you gleam from them
earthworm through dirt in a terrarium on a moving truck
look at it through the lens of a person you admire
make an art piece for your art piece
your biggest weakness is your new strength
find patterns in your current view
from the side it is a cityline
name the inanimate, personalize those you've never
time isn't even, factor it in
listen to your current desires, thank yourself later
make as many mistakes as possible
flip gravity, even for just a moment
lift something that could use a facelift
go to a site you've never visited
it's in the tiniest things; add a nice touch, a bedding
textural tasters aren't wrong, get on their level
be a documentarian, share & package for others
work with what you already have
what have you been watching/reading? is there a rhythm?
talk to a previous version of yourself
make it as rhythmic as possible
make your own instrument to use
choose a sense to mute for a while
ask the object what it wants
mimicry will get you anywhere; just get it down
do double of what you'd normally do
do half of what you normally would and work with it
what would make your younger self proud of you?
listen to what you say you can't do; smash it in fragments
set the stage, make a playground for yourself
create without gravity or care for how it connects
make your piece a person/creature and talk to them
shift your workspace, shut out all light and noise
let silence drive you entirely - listen in
split the space into shapes - play in each one
pick a corner to live in
make the rules you'll play by
every move costs a coin, keep the score
you're a shark, you can't stop swimming
the floor is lava: swimming through, what do you feel or see?
your constellation: shape it, name it, tell its story & elements
weave a pattern that threads through all elements
you are a prism, speak only in color and gradientize
your memory is limited: work in small, focused sections
borrow a glimmer from a friend - what inspires them?
experience the opposite of everything (play devil's advocate)
learn something very niche and then incorporate it
see the magic in the most mundane
at every end, a door appears
